Do i need to delete all of my files?

You don't have to extract anything after burning this iso.  You can boot to it for a fresh install or you can run it from inside vista to upgrade.  As for updates, this will be completely genuine and you can install ALL updates.

@Captcha: what would you need to delete?  No you do not need to delete anything.
